lastUpdated.description: A date that is combined with a time of day (hours, minutes, seconds) with fractional seconds that is based on a 24-hour clock. A timezone must be included. regex: \d{4}\-(0?[1-9]|1[012])\-(0?[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01]) ([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3])\:([0-5][0-9])\:([0-5][0-9])\.([0-9]{3,7})( ([\-\+]([0-1][0-9])\:00))? ref: [RFC3339](https://xml2rfc.tools.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)

severity.title: severity
severity.description: A coded value (aka enumeration). This has a defined code and a value intended for display to a human. Indicates that the value is taken from a set of controlled strings defined elsewhere (e.g., Value Set). A code is restricted to a string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace, and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents. regex: [^\s]+([\s]?[^\s]+)*

A timezone must be included. regex: \d{4}\-(0?[1-9]|1[012])\-(0?[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01]) ([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3])\:([0-5][0-9])\:([0-5][0-9])\.([0-9]{3,7})( ([\-\+]([0-1][0-9])\:00))? ref: [RFC3339](https://xml2rfc.tools.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)

id.description: Any combination of upper case or lower case alphanumeric charaters or specials chararaters. Can include ASCII letters (A-Z or a-z), numerals (0-9), dashes (-) or periods (.). Can be an integer, an un-prefixed Object Identifier (OID), globally/universally unique identifier (UUID/GUID; RFC [4122](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4122)), or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints. regex: ^[A-Za-z0-9\-\.]{1,64}$
